Texts.Chs: ^orange;M机甲^reset;是可以让你的生活变的更轻松的强大机器！要充分利用一台机甲，你需要一块^orange;机甲控制板^resset;。现在就试试你的 ^orange;新机甲控制板^reset; 吧！鼠标左键激活配置屏幕，鼠标右键你可以补充你的机甲燃料！
Texts.Eng: ^orange;Mechs^reset; are powerful machines that can really make your life easier! To make the most out of one, you need a ^orange;Mech Tablet^resset;. Try your new ^orange;Mech Tablet^reset; out now! Primary fire activates the configuration screen, and with the secondary fire you can set your mechs fuel!
